name: Sync & Share
tagline: Mozilla add-on to sync and share your history, bookmarks and tabs.
body:
### Welcome to Sync & Share.
This add-on syncs your tabs, bookmarks and history. Want to have the same tabs, bookmarks and history in all your devices? Then download this add-on and try it! Very easy to user and it has a help page if you get lost.

### Sign In
There is no need to create an account, as Mozilla Persona is supported by this add-on. You will just have to sign in with your everyday email account. 

### Download
You can also download it in the mozilla official site: 
* **Desktop version:** https://addons.mozilla.org/es/firefox/addon/sync-share/
* **Mobile version:** https://addons.mozilla.org/es/android/addon/sync-share-mobile-version/

But remember that this repository will always have the latest updated version.

### Authors
The author of this project is @shwe87 who created it as her career's final project in 2014.

### Support or Contact
Having troubles? Contact addonsyncshare@gmail.com and we'll help you sort it out. If you have any suggestions, you are welcome as well.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
